response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what you'd typically spend. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase the product for $95. This is a special deal that reflects both the value of the product and our desire to see it in capable hands like yours. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the benefits firsthand. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 95}
